China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ 2024 年 3 月 19 日星期二 09:15:46 GMT 120
Mainland Chinese surge into Hong Kong property after stamp duties scrappedAfter a pandemic-induced lull spanning more than three years, mainland Chinese are snapping up homes in Hong Kong, accounting for up to a third of new property sales weeks after the city removed all additional stamp duties on foreign buyers. Tue, 19 Mar 2024 09:02:33 GMT 5VWBDVFW5RK4HE3UVXT4YPKYIM https://www.reuters.com/business/mainland-chinese-surge-into-hong-kong-property-after-stamp-duties-scrapped-2024-03-19/Clare Jim商业
Exclusive: Putin to visit China in MayRussian President Vladimir Putin will travel to China in May for talks with Xi Jinping, in what could be the Kremlin chief's first overseas trip of his new presidential term, according to five sources familiar with the matter. Tue, 19 Mar 2024 08:45:33 GMT IOVATI4BY5LPJBASAQSGDLUZOA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russia-putin-visits-china-may-sources-2024-03-19/Laurie Chen, Yew Lun Tian, Guy Faulconbridge世界欧洲
India calls China defence ministry's claims over Arunachal Pradesh state 'absurd'India's foreign ministry said on Tuesday the Chinese defence ministry was advancing "absurd claims" over the territory of India's northeastern state of Arunachal Pradesh which it said will always be an "integral and inalienable part of India". Tue, 19 Mar 2024 08:30:34 GMT H4S3I2SWOBMTTCPGYXKDZV5GJQ https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/india-calls-china-defence-ministry-claims-over-arunachal-pradesh-state-absurd-2024-03-19/Reuters世界亚太地区
Many hospitals in China stop newborn delivery services as birth rate dropsMany hospitals in China have stopped offering newborn delivery services this year, state-backed news outlet Daily Economic News reported, with industry experts warning of an "obstetric winter" due to declining demand amid a record drop in new births. Tue, 19 Mar 2024 07:00:21 GMT IQM4DCAMENMR7EEQ5KZRK7JX3Q https://www.reuters.com/world/china/many-hospitals-china-stop-newborn-delivery-services-birth-rate-drops-2024-03-19/Reuters世界中国
Killing of teen in China puts 'left behind' children of migrant workers in spotlightThe killing of a 13-year old boy in northern China last week, for which three boys are in police custody, has triggered a heated discussion in the media on juvenile crime and the plight of children left at home by migrant workers. Tue, 19 Mar 2024 06:52:15 GMT 2OOWIMH4XNIA5B4RCQ44ECPDUU https://www.reuters.com/world/china/killing-teen-china-puts-left-behind-children-migrant-workers-spotlight-2024-03-19/Bernard Orr, Laurie Chen世界中国
Chinese developer Vanke's credit pursuit clouded by clamour for collateralA rare Beijing directive to help Vanke beat a liquidity crisis has left lenders scrabbling for the assets that the state-backed developer has proposed for collateral, as parties pull out all the stops to arrest deterioration in the property sector. Tue, 19 Mar 2024 06:25:04 GMT L4BEDXYZOWXLAKH3UP27DC5E https://www.reuters.com/markets/asia/chinese-developer-vankes-credit-pursuit-clouded-by-clamor-collat​​eral-2024-03-19/Engen Tham, Ziyi Tang, Clare Jim市场亚洲市场
